code: import{useCallback}from'react';import useBombFinance from'./useBombFinance';import useHandleTransactionReceipt from'./useHandleTransactionReceipt';var useRedeemFromBtcb=function useRedeemFromBtcb(){var bombFinance=useBombFinance();var handleTransactionReceipt=useHandleTransactionReceipt();var handleWithdraw=useCallback(function(amount){handleTransactionReceipt(bombFinance.redeemFromBtcb(amount),"Redeem ".concat(amount," BTCB from Supply"));},[bombFinance,handleTransactionReceipt]);return{onWithdraw:handleWithdraw};};export default useRedeemFromBtcb;
